dcterms:creator: Yoon Mi Oh

dcterms:description: A dataset of M¯aori words segmented by a fluent M¯aori speaker, used to compare segmentations produced by non-M¯aori-speaking New Zealanders and Morfessor.
dcterms:title: M¯aori words segmented by fluent M¯aori speaker (MS)

dcterms:creator: John C. Moorfield
dcterms:description: A comprehensive M¯aori-English, English-M¯aori dictionary that provides definitions and translations, used as a resource for morphological segmentation.
dcterms:title: Te Aka dictionary

dcterms:creator: Jeanette King

dcterms:description: A corpus that documents the changing uses of the M¯aori language, providing data for linguistic analysis.
dcterms:title: MAONZE corpus

dcterms:creator: Mary Teresa Boyce
dcterms:description: A corpus of modern spoken M¯aori, providing data for the study of contemporary usage of the language.
dcterms:title: M¯aori Broadcast Corpus

dcterms:description: A set of pseudo-M¯aori words generated for analysis, used to compare against real M¯aori words in morphological segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Pseudo-M¯aori words generated for analysis

dcterms:description: A dataset of words grouped according to morphological and phonological criteria, used to analyze segmentation performance.
